response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense significance to me. This product is worth more than just its monetary value, as it represents years of dedication and hard work. I am offering this extraordinary item to you at a special price of $15,000. I believe that given its uniqueness and the effort put into it, this price reflects its true worth and offers you a great opportunity. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or make an offer based on your valuation.", "product_price": 15000}
